short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dub YouTube videos in real-time using ElevenLabs API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LingoCub is a powerful Chrome extension that bridges language barriers by dubbing YouTube videos in real-time using the advanced AI technology of ElevenLabs. Ideal for multilingual communication, LingoCub enables users to experience videos in their preferred language, enhancing comprehension and engagement across global audiences.


Features:

Real-Time Dubbing: Translates YouTube videos into your target language, maintaining synchronization with the original video for a seamless experience.

Cross-Language Communication: Facilitates understanding between speakers of different languages by providing immediate audio translations.

Flexible Audio Customization: Customize the number of speakers to match the original content, enhancing the audio experience.

Simple Integration: Just install LingoCub, enter your ElevenLabs API key, and start dubbing YouTube videos effortlessly.


Why Use LingoCub?

Enhance Communication: LingoCub empowers users to connect with content across languages, helping bridge cultural and linguistic gaps.
Increase Accessibility: Non-native speakers can enjoy a wide range of content in their own language without relying on subtitles.
Quick Setup: Easy to install and start using, LingoCub integrates directly with YouTube for a seamless dubbing experience.


How It Works:

Install the LingoCub extension.
Enter your ElevenLabs API key in the settings.
Open a YouTube video, choose your preferred dubbing options, and watch as LingoCub dubs the content in real time!


Disclaimers:

Load Time: Depending on the length of the video and the quality of your internet connection, dubbed audio may take several seconds to synchronize and play. For longer videos, please allow additional time for processing.

API Usage: LingoCub requires a valid ElevenLabs API key to function, which users are responsible for obtaining. Additional charges may apply depending on usage, as per ElevenLabs' API pricing.

Content Accuracy: LingoCub relies on AI for dubbing. Translations may not be perfectly accurate and are intended to provide general comprehension rather than precise language translation.


Install LingoCub today and unlock the power of multilingual video content for enhanced communication!
